channel.title: How Do I Make Somewhere Non-wild?
channel.description: Im Developing my new server adscape V2, and the new spot where i am is in the wilderness, can someone please tell me how to make a place non-wild?

item.title: How Do I Make Somewhere Non-wild?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

find

public boolean nonWild() { if ((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <= 3431)
one of mine looks like

|| (absX >= 3039 && absX <= 3111 && absY >= 3475 && absY <= 3431)

now to make urs work

 || (absX >= X1 && absX <= X2 && absY >= Y1 && absY <= Y2)

go to the most southwestern coords you want in the safezone
put those in x1 and y1
go to the most northeastern coords you want in safezone
put those in x2 and y2
its like a big square

Read full topic
